page.title: 09The Leisure Survey.
page.content: We devised a questionaire to try to find out what people do in their spare time. We printed 75 sheets and stood on the Market Hill for about 1 hour. Sixty people answered our questions: 30 were interested in sport 10 were involved in sports clubs 21 used Sudbury's sports facilities (8 of these lived out of town) 18 were in other clubs etc. The activities mentioned were: golf,swimming,football,rugby,hockey, snooker,tennis,badminton,keep fit, squash,bridge,riding,netball,archery, basketball,table tennis,bowls,guides, WI,Age Concern,Scouts,Majorettes,Quay Theatre,CND,St.Johns,Rotary,Church and Charity Clubs. Though this is a long list from 60 people, there are many more activities listed in the town's library. By: Ann Bailey, Helen Everitt, Tracey Doherty.
